CustomField.description: AI-Enabled blended forecast using revised methodology: Commit deals at 95% (BL confidence), Gut deals at stage probability, others at 0. Uses Net ACV for existing customers.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Eudia_Tech__c, IF(Prior_Opp_ACV__c > 0, Renewal_Net_Change__c, ACV__c) > 0 ), IF(Prior_Opp_ACV__c > 0, Renewal_Net_Change__c, ACV__c) * CASE(TEXT(BL_Forecast_Category__c), "Closed", 1.00, "Commit", 0.95, "Gut", IF(Probability_Override__c, Custom_Probability_Value__c, Calculated_Probability__c), 0 ), 0 )
CustomField.label: Blended Forecast (AI-Enabled)
